Entries.DialogueText: Hello! You must be {Farmer_Name}, the new farmer. I'm Caroline.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello! You must be , the new er. I'm Caroline.

Entries.DialogueText: My husband runs the general store here. And have you met my daughter, Abigail? She's the pale one with the purple hair.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My hus runs the general store here. And have you met my daughter, Abigail? She's the pale one with the purple hair.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, sweetie. That's very kind of you to remember my birthday. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, sweetie. That's very kind of you to remember my birthday.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... is that... a birthday gift? I see... well, thanks for stopping by. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... is that... a birthday gift? I see... well, thanks for stopping by.

Entries.DialogueText: Ooohh... this is nice. I'll save it for a quiet day in the sunroom.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ooohh... this is nice. I'll save it for a quiet day in the sunroom.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, you've been foraging! Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, you've been foraging! Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: I'll make a spicy cocktail sauce with this. That'll put some hair on Pierre's chest. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll make a spicy cocktail sauce with this. That'll put some hair on Pierre's chest.

Entries.DialogueText: I noticed you're growing tea on your farm. Make sure to bring me a cup! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I noticed you're growing tea on your . Make sure to bring me a cup!

Entries.DialogueText: Abby told me that you and her are seeing each other. That's sweet!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abby told me that you and her are seeing each other. That's sweet!

Entries.DialogueText: I've never seen green rain before... It must not be too dangerous if you made it here!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've never seen green rain before... It must not be too dangerous if you made it here!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, the special rain is back! This year, I'm going to make the most of it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, the special rain is back! This year, I'm going to make the most of it!

Entries.DialogueText: This calls for a cup of green tea! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This calls for a cup of green tea!

Entries.DialogueText: It's fun to have a movie theater in town. I want to go see a western!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's fun to have a movie theater in town. I want to go see a western!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so happy for you two! Welcome to the family! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so happy for you two! Welcome to the family!

Entries.DialogueText: Pierre's trying to play it cool, but he's seething about losing to you at the Stardew Valley Fair.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pierre's trying to play it cool, but he's seething about losing to you at the Stardew Valley Fair.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, the newlywed. So, how was the honeymoon?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, the newlywed. So, how was the honeymoon?

Entries.DialogueText: I see. Well, I guess the farm would wither if you took time away...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I see. Well, I guess the would wither if you took away...

Entries.DialogueText: Are you feeling relaxed? I bet...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you feeling relaxed? I bet...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard you got a new kitchen! Think you'll be doing a lot of cooking?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard you got a new kitchen! Think you'll be doing a lot of cooking?

Entries.DialogueText: It's a good skill to have. And with all those fresh ingredients on your farm, you'll be sitting pretty!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a good skill to have. And with all those fresh ingredients on your , you'll be sitting pretty!

Entries.DialogueText: I see. Well, don't forget to eat right... nutrition is important.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I see. Well, don't forget to eat right... nutrition is important.

Entries.DialogueText: Judging by the savory smells wafting from your place, I can tell you've been busy in the kitchen! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Judging by the savory smells wafting from your , I can tell you've been busy in the kitchen!

Entries.DialogueText: Willy gave us each a piece of his fish jerky. I'm still chewing on it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy gave us each a piece of his fish jerky. I'm still chewing on it.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll sleep well tonight! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll sleep well tonight!

Entries.DialogueText: The water is so warm here compared to the valley. It's really pleasant!
Entries.DisplayPattern: The water is so warm here compared to the valley. It's really pleasant!

Entries.DialogueText: Caroline is trying to nap.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Caroline is trying to nap.

Entries.DialogueText: I told Gus to surprise me, and he made an iced green tea with mango zest. How nice! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I told Gus to surprise me, and he made an iced green tea with mango zest. How nice!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}. Are you here to relax, or to do work?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi . Are you here to relax, or to do work?

Entries.DialogueText: I wish Abby wouldn't spend so much time in her room.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish Abby wouldn't spend so much in her room.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. Are you enjoying the married life? I hope so!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . Are you enjoying the married life? I hope so!

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} Caroline23
Entries.DisplayPattern: # Caroline23

Entries.DialogueText: When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Wizard's tower. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Wizard's tower. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.

Entries.DialogueText: Abigail was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abigail was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?

Entries.DialogueText: I've seen wild horseradish in the forest.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've seen wild horseradish in the forest.

Entries.DialogueText: Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the farm?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the ?

Entries.DialogueText: If not, we might be able to help you out.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If not, we might be able to help you out.

Entries.DialogueText: We carry a variety of useful items.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We carry a variety of useful items.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} Caroline1
Entries.DisplayPattern: # Caroline1

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm... I wonder if I can get Pierre to cook dinner tonight.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm... I wonder if I can get Pierre to cook dinner tonight.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm... what am I going to make for dinner tonight?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm... what am I going to make for dinner tonight?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I'll just get take-out from the Saloon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I'll just get take-out from the Saloon.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a fine-looking day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a fine-looking day.

Entries.DialogueText: On days like this I like to help Evelyn with the public gardens.
Entries.DisplayPattern: On days like this I like to help Evelyn with the public gardens.

Entries.DialogueText: She's strong for her age, but I think she appreciates all the help she can get.
Entries.DisplayPattern: She's strong for her age, but I think she appreciates all the help she can get.

Entries.DialogueText: Is it just me, or does Abigail have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is it just me, or does Abigail have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I'm just too old to understand.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I'm just too old to understand.

Entries.DialogueText: Dinner's been a lot quieter since Abigail moved out...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dinner's been a lot quieter since Abigail moved out...

Entries.DialogueText: No, not because she used to chew with her mouth open! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: No, not because she used to chew with her mouth open!

Entries.DialogueText: Abby's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abby's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...

Entries.DialogueText: Abby's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm sure it's just a phase...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abby's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm sure it's just a phase...

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} Caroline12
Entries.DisplayPattern: # Caroline12

Entries.DialogueText: When we first moved here, I took a while to settle down... I wasn't ready for the domestic life.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When we first moved here, I took a while to settle down... I wasn't ready for the domestic life.

Entries.DialogueText: Pierre's a bit conventional... but he's a good man. He's ambitious, but he always puts his family first.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pierre's a bit conventional... but he's a good man. He's ambitious, but he always puts his family first.

Entries.DialogueText: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever take a day off?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever take a day off?

Entries.DialogueText: Stardew Valley is nice, but I wish I knew more people.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Stardew Valley is nice, but I wish I knew more people.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad that we've become friends.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad that we've become friends.

Entries.DialogueText: On Wednesdays the shop is closed.
Entries.DisplayPattern: On Wednesdays the shop is closed.

Entries.DialogueText: Keep that in mind if you're going to need anything.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Keep that in mind if you're going to need anything.

Entries.DialogueText: I've been seeing wild fruits in the forest lately.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been seeing wild fruits in the forest lately.

Entries.DialogueText: Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the farm?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the ?

Entries.DialogueText: If not, we might be able to help you out.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If not, we might be able to help you out.

Entries.DialogueText: We carry a variety of useful items.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We carry a variety of useful items.

Entries.DialogueText: Is it just me, or does Abigail look a little pale?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is it just me, or does Abigail look a little pale?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I'm just worrying about her too much.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I'm just worrying about her too much.

Entries.DialogueText: How's Abigail's health? She's always been such a pale girl. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little color in her cheeks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's Abigail's health? She's always been such a pale girl. Hopefully the lifestyle puts a little color in her cheeks.

Entries.DialogueText: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever take a day off?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever take a day off?

Entries.DialogueText: Time seems to go by faster and faster the older you get... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: seems to go by faster and faster the older you get...

Entries.DialogueText: Fall is Abby's favorite season, so I'm hoping she'll come out of her room more often.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fall is Abby's , so I'm hoping she'll come out of her room more often.

Entries.DialogueText: Abby was taking online classes here, but I don't think her heart was really in it...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abby was taking online classes here, but I don't think her heart was really in it...

Entries.DialogueText: She's a free spirit, like I was before I met Pierre. She's probably having the time of her life on your farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: She's a free spirit, like I was before I met Pierre. She's probably having the of her life on your .

Entries.DialogueText: I've seen edible mushrooms in the forest.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've seen edible mushrooms in the forest.

Entries.DialogueText: Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.

Entries.DialogueText: Is it just me, or does Abigail play too many video games?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is it just me, or does Abigail play too many video games?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I'm a little old-fashioned.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I'm a little old-fashioned.

Entries.DialogueText: You know, I used to want to be a farmer myself. Well, more like a rancher.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, I used to want to be a er myself. Well, more like a rancher.

Entries.DialogueText: I always loved movies about the wild west when I was a girl.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I always loved movies about the wild west when I was a girl.

Entries.DialogueText: Winter is harsh, but you can dig up some roots if you're lucky.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Winter is harsh, but you can dig up some roots if you're lucky.

Entries.DialogueText: Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.

Entries.DialogueText: Even though it's cold, I still check on the public garden beds every now and then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Even though it's cold, I still check on the public garden beds every now and then.

Entries.DialogueText: I just want to make sure they aren't damaged too much before spring returns.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I just want to make sure they aren't damaged too much before spring returns.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't you think Abby would look better with her natural hair color?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't you think Abby would look better with her natural hair color?

Entries.DialogueText: She used to have light chestnut-colored hair.
Entries.DisplayPattern: She used to have light chestnut-colored hair.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you excited for the new year?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you excited for the new year?

Entries.DialogueText: I predict that you'll be super-successful on your farm. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I predict that you'll be super-successful on your .

Entries.DialogueText: My garden is happy today. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My garden is happy today.

Entries.DialogueText: ...and our water bill will be lower this month.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...and our water bill will be lower this month.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, joy
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, joy

Entries.DialogueText: Relaxed
Entries.DisplayPattern: Relaxed

Entries.DialogueText: Looks like the gemstones were put to good use...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Looks like the gemstones were put to good use...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, cut it out! We're letting you live here free of charge until you finish school. It seems like you don't appreciate that at all! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, cut it out! We're letting you live here free of charge until you finish school. It seems like you don't appreciate that at all!

Entries.DialogueText: ...You're right. I'm sorry. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...You're right. I'm sorry.

Entries.DialogueText: Alright! That concludes our aerobics class!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Alright! That concludes our aerobics class!

Entries.DialogueText: Are you breaking a sweat? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you breaking a sweat?

Entries.DialogueText: Pierre!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pierre!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hi! Good morning, {Farmer_Name}. I'm glad you came in...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hi! Good morning, . I'm glad you came in...

Entries.DialogueText: I've been meaning to show you this... it's my private sunroom.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been meaning to show you this... it's my private sunroom.

Entries.DialogueText: So, what do you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, what do you think?

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you! I've worked very hard to make it this way... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you! I've worked very hard to make it this way...

Entries.DialogueText: Yes... when I step in here, I feel calm and relaxed right away. It's really therapeutic!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes... when I step in here, I feel calm and relaxed right away. It's really therapeutic!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh? I find the warmth soothing, myself. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh? I find the warmth soothing, myself.

Entries.DialogueText: It feels better if you keep still.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It feels better if you keep still.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, but you're a professional... For me, it's just a hobby.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, but you're a professional... For me, it's just a hobby.

Entries.DialogueText: You see, this is my sanctuary... a place where I can always find peace...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see, this is my sanctuary... a where I can always find peace...

Entries.DialogueText: And it's a perfect place to drink my home-grown tea! Here, let's have a cup...
Entries.DisplayPattern: And it's a perfect to drink my home-grown tea! Here, let's have a cup...

Entries.DialogueText: Sure, no problem...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sure, no problem...

Entries.DialogueText: Delicious
Entries.DisplayPattern: Delicious

Entries.DialogueText: I love to come in here for a fresh cup of tea every day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love to come in here for a fresh cup of tea every day.

Entries.DialogueText: It's my little ritual...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's my little ritual...

Entries.DialogueText: Uh... let me try to explain... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Uh... let me try to explain...

Entries.DialogueText: I hope that makes sense...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope that makes sense...

Entries.DialogueText: Life can be pretty hectic, so having a hobby like this is nice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Life can be pretty hectic, so having a hobby like this is nice.

Entries.DialogueText: Feel free to come here and relax any time you want, okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Feel free to come here and relax any you want, okay?

Entries.DialogueText: Pierre is very serious about his grange display. He's been setting aside the best-looking produce for weeks in preparation.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pierre is very serious about his grange display. He's been setting aside the best-looking produce for weeks in preparation.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!

Entries.DialogueText: Some of the produce in our grange display came from my little greenhouse. We've been carefully growing this stuff all year! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some of the produce in our grange display came from my little greenhouse. We've been carefully growing this stuff all year!

Entries.DialogueText: I get scared very easily. I'll leave the haunted maze to the younger people.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I get scared very easily. I'll leave the haunted maze to the younger people.

Entries.DialogueText: I should make a plate of food for my husband. He's been manning the shop all night. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I should make a plate of food for my hus. He's been manning the shop all night.

Entries.DialogueText: Abby's always loved the egg hunt, ever since she was a tiny girl.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abby's always loved the egg hunt, ever since she was a tiny girl.

Entries.DialogueText: It may be a little boring, but these festivals are a good chance to connect with our neighbors.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It may be a little boring, but these festivals are a good chance to connect with our neighbors.

Entries.DialogueText: I wish Pierre would spend this time with the family... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish Pierre would spend this with the family...

Entries.DialogueText: I'd ask my husband to dance, but he doesn't really know how. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd ask my hus to dance, but he doesn't really know how.

Entries.DialogueText: I put fresh vegetables from my garden into the communal soup pot.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I put fresh vegetables from my garden into the communal soup pot.

Entries.DialogueText: Gus used my potatoes to make several dishes for the buffet. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gus used my potatoes to make several dishes for the buffet.

Entries.DialogueText: So, what kind of ingredient are you adding to the soup? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, what kind of ingredient are you adding to the soup?

Entries.DialogueText: These candles are romantic, aren't they?
Entries.DisplayPattern: These candles are romantic, aren't they?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm happy the jellies choose to visit us during their trip south. It's a magical moment our community can share together. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm happy the jellies choose to visit us during their trip south. It's a magical moment our community can share together.

Entries.DialogueText: Ooohh... I've had too much nog. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ooohh... I've had too much nog.

Entries.DialogueText: Isn't the tree gorgeous? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Isn't the tree gorgeous?

Entries.DialogueText: I spent all morning decorating it with Marnie and Jodi. It's a fun tradition!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I spent all morning decorating it with Marnie and Jodi. It's a fun tradition!

Entries.DialogueText: How's winter coming along for you, {Farmer_Name}? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's winter coming along for you, ?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. Are you finding any time to relax from your farming duties this winter? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . Are you finding any to relax from your ing duties this winter?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, {Farmer_Name}... you're spoiling me! I love it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, ... you're spoiling me! I love it!

Entries.DialogueText: For me? This is such a thoughtful gift! Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: For me? This is such a thoughtful gift! Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... I see. I'll, uh... make sure to put it to good use...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... I see. I'll, uh... make sure to put it to good use...

Entries.DialogueText: Um... I guess I could use it for compost...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... I guess I could use it for compost...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, that's sweet. Thank you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, that's sweet. Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, {Farmer_Name}... This is embarrassing. I threw one of your {2}s you sold us into my compost bin. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, ... This is embarrassing. I threw one of your {2}s you sold us into my compost bin.

Entries.DialogueText: Now the whole thing smells horrendous. Where did you find that thing again?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now the whole thing smells horrendous. Where did you find that thing again?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, {Farmer_Name}... This is embarrassing. I threw one of your {2}s you sold us into my compost bin. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, ... This is embarrassing. I threw one of your {2}s you sold us into my compost bin.

Entries.DialogueText: But on the bright side, the worms are really loving it! They've never looked happier!
Entries.DisplayPattern: But on the bright side, the worms are really loving it! They've never looked happier!

Entries.DialogueText: I've always loved movies about the wild west, so I'm really excited to see this!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've always loved movies about the wild west, so I'm really excited to see this!

Entries.DialogueText: That was great! It really felt authentic, with the costumes and everything.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was great! It really felt authentic, with the costumes and everything.

Entries.DialogueText: This movie looks so cute, I was really hoping someone would invite me!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This movie looks so cute, I was really hoping someone would invite me!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope the poor little guy will be okay... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope the poor little guy will be okay...

Entries.DialogueText: That was adorable. Thanks so much for inviting me to this!
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was adorable. Thanks so much for inviting me to this!

Entries.DialogueText: '{0}'... I have no idea what this is about! I hope it's not violent.
Entries.DisplayPattern: '{0}'... I have no idea what this is about! I hope it's not violent.

Entries.DialogueText: That wasn't bad! I'll have to ask Abigail about it when I'm home, I'm sure she's seen it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That wasn't bad! I'll have to ask Abigail about it when I'm home, I'm sure she's seen it.

Entries.DialogueText: I have a feeling this one's going to be a let-down... But I'm still interested to give it a try.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have a feeling this one's going to be a let-down... But I'm still interested to give it a try.

Entries.DialogueText: That was silly... I bet Pierre would like it. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was silly... I bet Pierre would like it.

Entries.DialogueText: This weather is just perfect. I can't tell where my skin ends and the air begins. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This weather is just perfect. I can't tell where my skin ends and the air begins.

Entries.DialogueText: Hello. I hope you see something you like.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello. I hope you see something you like.
